pages.text: Frostfall is a powerful hammer that harnesses the power of ice to freeze its enemies solid. The hammer is crafted from a rare metal that is able to withstand the intense cold of the ice. The hammer head is imbued with the power of ice, allowing it to freeze anything it strikes.

The hammer's unique ability is the ability to encase its wielder in a protective layer of ice, granting them increased regeneration and resistance. It's said that the hammer was created by a powerful wizard who imbued it with the power of the winter, making it a fearsome weapon on the battlefield.
